DOC.criteria: male female healthy volunteer age 18 60 year , affiliate covered French social security system , BMI ≥20 ≤30 kg/m² Patients without chronic medical surgical illness Patients normal clinical examination screen visit , Patients normal blood pressure screen visit : systolic BP < 140 mmHg diastolic BP < 90 mmHg , determine patient seat rest least 5 minute , Patients within normal range value follow laboratory test ( appendix I ) unless investigator considers abnormality clinically irrelevant ( document agree sponsor inclusion ) within 1 month prior start study ( MRI sub study volunteer ) , Absence cannabis , opiate , cocaine , amphetamine history ( MRI sub study volunteer ) history drug abuse history hypersensitivity ( disease drug ) treatment platelet inhibit drug within one week inclusion treatment anticoagulant within four week inclusion subject likely take medication study contraindication MRI : metallic intracorporeal device , claustrophobia prior participation interventional clinical research within 3 month custody due administrative legal decision tutelage admit sanitary social institution .
